description: This file contains code for setting up and using AgentQL tools for web scraping, including creating agents with specific models and tools, and executing responses with custom queries.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class representing an agent that can perform tasks using specified models and tools.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: A class representing an OpenAI chat model used as the agent's language model.

classes.name: AgentQLTools
classes.description: A class providing tools for AgentQL, used for web scraping and data extraction.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method to execute the agent and print the response from a given URL, optionally in markdown format.
